about_us.intro: Even with more than a decade‚Äôs experience of this exciting industry as both players and professionals, it still surprises us how poor the user experience often is at online betting. Know what we mean?
about_us.bad_experience4: Websites that are difficult to use
about_us.fb88_was_born: Which got us wondering: what if we were to launch an online gaming company that really cares; a place where players truly feel appreciated and entertained like at no other site, and where ease of use is a top priority. This is how FB88 was born.
about_us.leading_betting_company: Exploding onto the online sportsbook making scene in 2011, it‚Äôs origins are in the UK and FB88.COM quickly established itself as one of the world‚Äôs leading betting and gaming companies, providing players across the globe with the odds are up to 20% better than those on offer from a betting exchange.Today, FB88 caters to experienced and novice bettors in more than 90 countries and remains committed to bringing all our customers the earliest and most competitive prices every single day, excellent product offering and superior customer service.
about_us.fb88_trusted_name_desc: FB88.COM is being fully licensed and regulated in the IOM , one of the most highly regarded gaming jurisdictions in the world, gives you the comfort that you can enjoy our games knowing that they‚Äôll be fair and rest assured, all transactions online with us are protected using impenetrable digital encryption technology, creating a safe and regulated arena in which to comfortably bet from anywhere, at any time.
about_us.our_mission_desc: To be the market leader in the global online gaming industry, as measured by number of members and member satisfaction.
about_us.our_brands_content1: From our colors that symbolize royalty and wealth, to our logo that stands out denoted by crooked shaped alphabet ‚ÄòF‚Äô and 'B' with the meaning ‚ÄúF‚Äù is Fair and ‚ÄúB‚Äù is Bet, is said for the betting word or symbolization of connecting FB88 and you, customers go to FB88 largely betting firm for entertainment .
about_us.our_clients_content1: FB88 has a client list of million from all over the world and continues to grow on its reputation of excellence, integrity and professionalism. Our commitment to laying the largest bets in the industry attracts some of the most serious high-stakes in the world.
about_us.variety_of_products_content1: If you‚Äôre looking for a premium betting site with premium products from Sportbook, in-play sport betting, live casino, slot games, lottery product, B2B and more, then you‚Äôve come to exactly the right place! We host games from many industry-leading providers. These are all state-of-the-art and are constantly being updated, so no player will be bored here!
about_us.variety_of_products_content2: FB88.com is fully committed to providing members with outstanding quality, the lasted online betting technology and the best gaming experience , quality entertainment to people who enjoy gambling.
about_us.easy_access_content1: FB88 was designed to offer you MORE excitement for the SAME stake and for the way YOU want to play. That is why all our products come with a greater variation, usability and excitement than any other site on the globe.
about_us.easy_access_content2: You can bet safely and securely with us on our easy-to-use mobile and desktop sites, as well as through the app on Apple and Android devices, using a number of different payment options.
about_us.safe_and_responsible_content1: As FB88 operates in a large number of countries, they adhere to dedicated licenses for each one and have gone through a number of audits and checks from the relevant gambling authorities. The website and all players‚Äô personal data is kept safe and secure, protected by state-of-the-art encryption methods. We are constantly improving to ensure that players receive maximum enjoyment from what we provide, whether it‚Äôs the sports betting platform or the fantastic range of live casino, lottery product and more . You can deposit and withdraw using several different payment methods, including the more traditional bank transfer as well as e-wallets.
about_us.safe_and_responsible_content2: Measures to ensure data security include physically backing up data, access controls, the use of error-tolerant systems, and measures for data back-up and encryption. This is an area where FB88 meets the highest security standards in the industry, with a five-level security system, multiple firewalls, and 128-bit SSL encryption. Early-warning systems in the form of limits on unusually high stakes and winnings prevent manipulation and other criminal activities at an early stage.
about_us.commitment_and_concessions_content1: We at FB88 take pride in putting our customer first before everything that we do. Our customers are the most important part of our business and we endeavour to provide the highest level of excellence in our customer service. We aim to respond to our customer queries within acceptable world standards. Our customer support team is on call 24 hours, 365 days a year to assist you with any queries or technical difficulties via chat, email, or phone.
about_us.fair_games_trusted_place: ‚ÄúFair Games to Play - Trusted Place to Bet‚Äù
about_us.strive_to_do: which is what we strive to do.

privacy_policy.overview_content1: In its everyday business operations FB88 makes use of a variety of data about identifiable individuals, including data about You. In collecting and using this data, the organization is subject to a variety of legislation controlling how such activities may be carried out and the safeguards that must be put in place to protect it.
privacy_policy.overview_content2: This Privacy Policy defines the handling of personal data including sensitive data and other non-personal data that FB88 obtains from you in connection with your use of FB88‚Äôs services. This Privacy Policy applies to FB88.COM.
privacy_policy.overview_content3: If you use FB88 services, you consent to the collection, use and sharing of your personal data under this Privacy Policy. You have the option of using tools to control how we use and share your data. Detailed information about them has been included in this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree with this policy, do not access or use FB88‚Äôs Services or interact with any other aspect of its business.
privacy_policy.overview_content4: This Privacy Notice describes how FB88.COM ('FB88', 'Our', 'Us', as appropriate) collects, use, stores, shares or keeps your personal information when you use our services through our website and mobile application. It also describes your data protection rights, including a right to object to some of the processing which We carry out.
privacy_policy.overview_content5: Your privacy on the Internet is very important to us. We are committed to maintaining the security, confidentiality and fair handling of the personal information collected by us in order to allow you to enjoy playing online at FB88. At all times we aim to comply with our duties and your rights under data protection laws.
privacy_policy.information_collected: Information Collected and Means of Collecting
privacy_policy.failure_to_provide_content1: If you fail to provide that information ‚Äì such as copies of documents to confirm your identity ‚Äì we may be unable to provide your requested service.
privacy_policy.how_long_content1: Personal data may be processed and stored as long as FB88 has a legally legitimate interest and this interest overrides your interests and fundamental rights. If the interest of FB88 regarding the processing and storage of your data is not superior to your interests and fundamental rights, the data can still be processed and stored if necessary by law. In such cases, the data may be stored only for the purpose of meeting the requirements of legal provisions.
privacy_policy.how_long_content2: How long FB88 keeps information it collect about you depends on the type of information. FB88 will retain your personal data only as long as it is necessary to meet the objectives set out in this Privacy Policy. After such time, FB88 will either delete or anonymize your information or, if this is not possible (for example, because the information has been stored in backup archives), then we will securely store your information and isolate it from any further use until deletion is possible regarding legal and technical possibilities.
privacy_policy.monitoring_content1: We may monitor and record communications with you (such as telephone or chat conversations and email) for the purpose of quality assurance, fraud prevention and compliance.
privacy_policy.minors_content1: FB88 takes our responsibility to protect children from the social impact of wagering seriously, until they are legally able to make such decisions. FB88 will not accept information from minors for the purpose of opening a wagering account.
privacy_policy.minors_content2: We reserve the right to access and verify any Personal Information collected from you. In the event that we become aware that a user who is not Legally of Age has shared any information, we may discard such information. If you have any reason to believe that a minor has shared any information with us, please contact us at help@fb88.com
privacy_policy.advertisements_content1: We use a third-party advertising technology to serve advertisements when you visit the platforms and use the services. This technology uses non-personal information (technical, gameplay, device and connection, analytic, anonymous, data combination) with regards to your use of the services to serve advertisements to you (e.g. by placing third-party cookies on your web browser). We may also use our third parties and share with them non-personal information to assist us in evaluating the success of our advertising campaigns and help us retargeting our users. You may opt-out of many third-party ad networks.
privacy_policy.advertisements_content2: Where we have the appropriate consent or lawful basis and subject to your preferences, some of your personal data can be processed by our 3rd party marketing partners in order to allow us to communicate with all our customers either by (i.e. phone, email, push notifications).This may include Email & SMS sending platform providers, prize or gift suppliers, etc.
privacy_policy.advertisements_content3: All our marketing communications, will include instructions on how to opt out of receiving this specific type of marketing communication. It can take up to 48 hours following on from your request for this to be fully carried out.
privacy_policy.retention_of_info_content1: The period for which we may retain data about you will depend on the purposes for which the data was collected, whether you have requested the deletion of the data, and whether any legal obligations require the retention of the data (for example, for regulatory compliance). We will retain data about you for at least as long as is necessary to fulfil the purposes for which the data was collected. Where We process your personal information for marketing purposes or with your consent, We process the personal information until you ask Us to stop and for a short period after this (to allow us to implement Your requests). We also keep a record of the fact that you have asked Us not to send you direct marketing or to process your personal information indefinitely so that We can respect your request in future.
privacy_policy.retention_of_info_content2: Where We process your personal information for compliance with our legal obligations, We will do so in accordance with all retention periods specified by applicable law.
privacy_policy.cookies_content1: You agree that we may, from time to time, place cookies on your device to save information (such as user name, password, other personal details, e-mail address, technical device information such as the model and its IP address) to make full use of the functionality and services on our website and to allow your browser to identify you as a user. These cookies cannot be used to run programs or deliver viruses to your computer, and are uniquely assigned to you. It can only be read by the web server(s) that placed the cookies on your device
privacy_policy.cookies_content2: We may use cookies as a means of collecting information from a web server for the above purposes following a customer's use of the Website. If you register with us or if you continue to use the website, you agree to our use of cookies.
privacy_policy.cookies_content3: A cookie is a text-only string of information that we send to the cookie file of the browser on the hard disk of your computer, smart phone or another device, if you agree. These cookies allow us to distinguish you from other users when you visit and/or use our website. We may use the data generated from cookies to compile statistical data on your use of our website. You are not obliged to accept cookies from us and you have the ability to accept or decline cookies at any time by modifying the settings in your browser.
privacy_policy.cookies_content4: Online browsers can usually be set to either accept or decline cookies. However, if cookies are declined You may not be able to fully experience the interactive features of the Service.
privacy_policy.cookies_content5: If you want to delete any cookies already stored on your computer or stop the cookies that keep track of your browsing patterns on the Website, you can do so by deleting your existing cookies and/or altering your browser's privacy settings to block cookies (the process you follow will different from browser to browser). Please note that deleting our cookies or disabling our future cookies means that you may not be able to access certain areas or features of the Website.
privacy_policy.cookies_content6: To opt-out of our use of cookies, you can instruct your browser, by changing its options, to stop accepting cookies or to prompt you before accepting a cookie from websites you visit. If you do not accept cookies, however, you may not be able to use all aspects of services. FB88 and its third party partners also collect information using web beacons (also known as 'tracking pixels').
privacy_policy.cookies_content7: Many browsers include their own management tools for removing HTML5 local storage objects.
privacy_policy.cookies_content8: You will not be able to opt-out of any cookies or other technologies that are ‚Äústrictly necessary‚Äù for the services.
privacy_policy.cookies_content9: For help on how to modify your browser settings, see our FAQs here.
privacy_policy.how_to_contact_content1: If you have any general questions about the Services or the information that we collect about you and how we use it, please contact us via email help@fb88.com
privacy_policy.how_to_contact_content2: We will make an effort to reply within a reasonable time frame. Please feel free to reach out to us at any time. If you are unsatisfied with our response, you can reach out to the applicable data protection supervisory authority.

promotions.terms_and_conditions1: Registration and participation is allowed only 1 (one) per person, family, household address, email address, payment account number, email address, telephone number, IP address. Bonus will be refused to players who do not comply with this term and odd accounts will be closed. (Please, refer to General Terms and Conditions ‚Äì Account Opening and Security policy). We reserve the right to withdraw the availability of any offer and to redeem all bonus and winnings money accumulated by any customer or group of customers at any time and at our sole and absolute discretion.
promotions.terms_and_conditions2: All offers from FB88.com only for members that register with exact information (Contact number, First name, Last Name, Date of Birth, Email address, Bank account information, etc.)
promotions.terms_and_conditions3: FB88.com offers are intended for recreational players only and FB88.com may in our sole discretion limit the eligibility of customers to participate in any promotion.
promotions.terms_and_conditions4: Before any withdrawals are processed, your play will be reviewed for any breach of our terms and conditions and irregular playing patterns. If any terms of an offer/ promotion are breached or if there is evidence of bets/wagers placed by a customer or group of customers (for example, betting patterns on the same events/markets that are identified across multiple accounts), which due to a Free Bet, Bonus, enhanced payment, our Cash Out feature or any other promotional offer resulted in guaranteed customer profits irrespective of the outcome, whether individually or as part of a group, FB88 reserves the right, at our sole discretion, to void Free Bet or Bonus stakes or void any stakes funded by the use of previously awarded Free Bets or Bonuses and withhold any withdrawals and/or confiscate all winnings. FB88 also reserves the right to confiscate the Free Bet or Bonus awarded from such offers and remove winnings from these and/or linked accounts. Any abuse of the bonus offer will lead to closure of the account.
promotions.terms_and_conditions5: The customer must provide identification documents, if necessary, to validate their identity (KYC). Failure to produce documents if requested may lead to forfeiture of the bonus and winnings. The company reserves the right to request the customer‚Äôs photo with their identification document (the customer‚Äôs face must be clearly visible in the photo) or phone call identification at any time.
promotions.terms_and_conditions6: FB88 reserves the right to amend, cancel, reclaim or refuse any promotion at its own discretion.

responsible_gaming.content_paragraph1: FB88.Com strives to provide a channel of entertainment to our customer in a positive way. In serving this purpose, we have in place major safeguards to promote and ensure responsible gambling. We encourage our customers to identify their degree of problem gambling risk through the assessment of the checklist below:
responsible_gaming.content_paragraph2: If the majority of the answers are 'yes', it may be a sign of gambling problem. We recommend that you:
content_paragraph3: To seek advice and support on gambling problem, please visit GamCare at
responsible_gaming.content_paragraph5: For customers who wish to self-exclude themselves from gambling, we provide a self-exclusion facility enabling customers to close their account(s) for a minimum period of six months up to five years as requested. Please contact Customer Services via the 'Contact Us' section of our website for more information.
responsible_gaming.content_paragraph7: It is against the law for someone under the age of 18 to gamble. FB88.Com reserves the right to request for proof of age from any customer and to perform checks to verify the information provided. Customer accounts may be suspended and funds withheld until satisfactory proof of age is provided. The legal gambling age varies across countries; hence we advise you to carry out local research before partaking in any form of gambling.
responsible_gaming.content_paragraph8: FB88.Com strongly advise our customers to prevent potential misuse by keeping their account number, user name and password confidential.
responsible_gaming.content_paragraph10: There are a number of third party applications that parents/guardians can utilize for monitoring or restriction of their computer's access to the Internet:
content_list1: Do you stay away from work or studying in order to gamble?
Do you gamble to escape from boredom or unhappiness?
When gambling and you run out of money, do you feel lost and in despair and feel the need to gamble again as soon as possible?
Do you gamble until all your money is lost?
Have you ever lied to cover up the amount of money or time you have spent gambling?
Have you ever lied, borrowed or stolen to maintain betting habits?
Are you reluctant to spend gambling money on anything else?
Have you lost interest in your family, friends or hobbies?
After losing, do you feel you must try and win back your losses as soon as possible?
content_list2: Gamble as a form of leisure.
Keep track of the time and amount of money spent
content_list3: Net Nanny filtering software protects children from inappropriate web content:
